page.title: 17Daily Life for a 12yr. Old.
page.content: On Going to Sponne School. I'd said Goodbye' to Blakesley School, Now I had to go to Sponne. I was frightened I'd be teased perhaps Or maybe put upon. I'd liked the village school, But now Goodbye' to Blakesley. The lessons would be harder though And homework with Maths and History! In fact I like this school a lot, But I don't like the bus Or the way I have to tie a tie And because my mum makes a fuss. She makes me get up early And wash behind my ears. But I'm at Sponne in 85- And I'll be here for years.
